mapper.insert: insert into items(name, price, description, parent_id, field) values(#{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{parentId}, #{field})
mapper.update: update items set field=#{field}, name=#{name}, price=#{price}, description=#{description} where item_no = #{itemNo}
mapper.select: select * from items where parent_id = #{parentId} or parent_id=0
mapper.delete: delete from kids_store where kid_id = #{kidId} and item_no = #{itemNo}
mapper.select: select a.item_no, name, a.price, a.description, a.field, b.request from items as a join kids_store as b on a.item_no = b.item_no and b.kid_id = #{kidId};
mapper.update: update kids_store set request = true where item_no = #{itemNo} and kid_id = #{kidId}
